messages.TRMSG_PRE_BATTLE:
My Pokémon toughened up while working
on the ranch.I’m right proud of them!
messages.TRMSG_DEFEAT:
Hahahah! Your Pokémon sure can be
counted on!
messages.TRMSG_POST_BATTLE:
When I cuddle with my Pokémon, I can
feel not just their bodies’ warmth, but their compassion.
messages.TRMSG_REMATCH:
Whoa! You’re that real-tough
Trainer from before!Here are my ranch-toughened Pokémon!
I’m right proud of them!
